website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, high-force hammer with many use cases. Engineered to prevent damage to the object being hit.
pros: Bright color is easy to spot
cons: Occasional reports of damage to the hammer itself during heavy-duty work

customer_reviews.title: He liked it at first
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to one of my masons to try out. He liked it at first, until the second day when this happened. It's the 4 lbs hammer, not the 2 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lionetti

customer_reviews.title: Made in China not SD
customer_reviews.text: The hammer is fine but I was disappointed that it was made in China. The info says a family owned biz in SD which convinced me to buy this one. I guess I missed where it said this hammer is made in China. I am satisfied with the product quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for why I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an exercise tool. It is heavy, well balanced, constructed fine. the price wasn't terribly bad, although the one we accidentally through a way from a discount chain store was cheaper, but didn't require shipping. This came to me via amazon prime, which sometimes means (Shipping included in the cost if we don't have sales competition)
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do the job
customer_reviews.text: I’ve put down 180 AllanBlocks (80 lbs each) and struck them maybe 10 blows per block (1800 blows) and it already kaput! I still have a lot of wall to go. Supper sad!
customer_reviews.author: A.E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Whatever it's filled with, it "sprinkles"
customer_reviews.text: I took this item out of the packaging, and tried to use it on a soft piece of wood and a chisel. It is "sprinkling" whatever is inside, like a salt shaker. Very dubious
customer_reviews.author: JJE

customer_reviews.title: Hammer fell apart in only 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I've used dead blow hammers like this for a long time. Typically, they last for years and years, if not decades. This hammer was terrible. It fell apart in 6 months. It is still clean and shiny but no longer works. I recommend you don't waste your money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: RSeaman

customer_reviews.title: Handle snapped in 4 days of homeowner use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second hammer. I am using them to set retaining wall blocks on the base course. The first one wore and had a circular piece fall off exposing the container that holds the shot. I attributed that to wear until I saw others with the same issue. Nevertheless, I bought another. This time, the handle snapped up by the head. I am a homeowner working on one project and it failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time but the box barely contained the 4 lb hammer. I have used the Dead Blow Hammer for several days on heavy landscape stone and it has held up. I'm using a piece of wood as a buffer between the hammer and the stone because the stone has a rough face and I generally like to take care of my new tools. Hammer is working and holding up so far and I am satisfied with the hammer at this point.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Recognizable color, differentiate from other workers tools.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 20 year old Blue point 4 lbs dead blow. One of the best "placement" "displacement" tools going. Terrific for adjusting framing, cabinets, trim etc. Non-marring surface, if used properly won't leave any dents or damage of finish surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: W. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Almost indestructible
customer_reviews.text: We use these to beat metal pins out of molds. We have gone through many different brands of dead blow style mallets and they all get tore up very quickly. This brand holds up very well. We have ordered others in different weights.
customer_reviews.author: msod

customer_reviews.title: Great for processing kindling.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hammer to process kindling wood. So far, it is the perfect solution for my froe. Just heavy enough to make things work like they should, but not too heavy to make it strenuous.
customer_reviews.author: Perry R.

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer
customer_reviews.text: what can I say other than it works. Purchased to use to install Premiere 1 fencing bc it stated a dead blow hammer was recommended. Worked perfect for driving staked posts and is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyN__c

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Garbage quality. Thin plastic. Didn't make it through use. There are molding holes on each side with rust powder pouring out.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Quality Soft Blow Hammer
customer_reviews.text: This soft blow hammer has a good quality appearance and is well balanced. Its design makes its use easy on the hand and arm, even with its 3 lb. head weight. The soft molded cover will make this hammer easier to grasp securely during heavy use. I am quite pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Needed a dead blow hammer
customer_reviews.text: Our son could not get the aluminum wheel off his pick up truck. This did the trick. Was delivered next day, right when he arrived to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: ironmke

customer_reviews.title: very pleased, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: recipient loved it. said it has good heft and feels comfortable in hand. also the color distinguishes it from the other tools making it easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: irish kate

customer_reviews.title: Good quality !!!
customer_reviews.text: 2lb. hammerhead face, you can see the metal frame thru the rubber casting. Don't know if this will become a problem in the future. Also bought the 4lb. hammer. What a monster! I will be getting my way with this persuader!
customer_reviews.author: HJTIII

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last like a Stanley
customer_reviews.text: While it gets the job done, this tool does not last. The rubber/plastic outside tears and breaks down quickly. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Decent deadblow. Don't expect it to last very long before the rubber on the head starts to rip away. Mine lasted about four months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The feel is very nice. It works perfectly for my need to have ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly, and well packaged. The feel is very nice. It works perfectly for my need to have a quiet, non-marking hammer to seat the bolts necessary to load by bicycle rack onto my trailer hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan In Texas

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well balanced tool.
customer_reviews.text: These deadblow mallets are great. Well balanced with good grip. Color is a bonus...nobody will steal it at work...lol.
customer_reviews.author: JSF

customer_reviews.title: A must have tool!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, comfortable to use, and easy to find! It has a nice weight to it and the coating is well done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would order again!
customer_reviews.text: The handle was slightly thinner than I thought but I won't use this every day. It's a great tool for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woodworker who is picky about good tools. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: So far it works nice and definitely doesn't smell like chemicals. Besides everything is made overseas. Like it
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B Good

customer_reviews.title: Nice hammer
customer_reviews.text: I am a farmer and use this for putting step-in fence posts into the ground securely - works nicely and my arm doesn't get tired as it is pretty well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Kirdulis

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! I want my money back!
customer_reviews.text: 0/5 stars.. This thing lasted about 7 solid hits before the head broke, the ends came apart and all the sand went flying (See other customer photos of hammer coming apart) Will not purchase again. Spend a few more dollars and hopefully get more than 15 seconds out of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Lilienthal

customer_reviews.title: Shiny hammer
customer_reviews.text: Shining color, can’t miss it in your workshop! Feels good in your hand, you can strike with full power without sacrificing the object you strike on. Best value for money!!! Time will say regarding stability Thanks for your service
customer_reviews.author: Shagaat

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to pound Cosmos® Pack of 6 Orange Color Aluminum Tent Stakes for Camping / Trip / Hiking / Backpacking or Other Outdoor Activities in Sand or Snow (also purchased from Amazon) into the sand when using a SunBrella (Amazon purchase). As happy as one can be with a mallet!
customer_reviews.author: KAT People

customer_reviews.title: Head broke after a few hits.
customer_reviews.text: Work great for a few hits on pavers then the head separated internally.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Held up well for a 27 linear foot retentional wall that I did. 4 pounds was perfect for me and the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to remove some stuck on brake rotors for my car and it definitely did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Dead Blow
customer_reviews.text: Very good hammer for the money. Four pounds is just the right weight, so far it does not look like I have used it.
customer_reviews.author: ollieski

customer_reviews.title: Great product fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product I haven’t used it yet but seems sturdy and like it will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine
customer_reviews.text: Haven't really used it yet, but seems to be all it should be. Sometimes these get brittle after a while and shatter while use. Looks ok and I won't have any trouble seeing it, due to the bright orange! Haha.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carter

customer_reviews.title: 11.4 oz , 1 pound, 25 oz hammer?
customer_reviews.text: The product description for this 1 pound (16 ounces) item says it weighs 11.4 ounces. When it arrived I weighed it and it weighs 25 ounces. Place your order and roll the dice because you never know what you’re going to get.
customer_reviews.author: David Tafoya

customer_reviews.title: Great tools
customer_reviews.text: They worked well and didn't damage parts. Now I can beat the hell out of that stubborn 66 Honda...and not kill it. Thank you; Rick
customer_reviews.author: rick roos

customer_reviews.title: Straight to the point
customer_reviews.text: Good hammer for DIY home use, still holding up, getting marred easily
customer_reviews.author: AMZNSTU

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Look like a very nice set haven’t used enough to see how they hold up but looks good!
customer_reviews.author: E-man

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain and superior durability
customer_reviews.text: This hammer is great for the money and the last one I had lasted well over a year and that’s with every day hard abuse with my job. And my last one is still functional except I had to tape it up cause it split a little bit but it’s a superior hammer for sure
customer_reviews.author: James Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Busted open after 50 hits. There isn't even enough metal pellets inside so you can hear them rattle around while you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool belt
customer_reviews.text: a few more loops would be nice especially to fit pliers.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherd mom

customer_reviews.title: Not good for masonry
customer_reviews.text: I used the 3lb hammer for setting retaining wall block. By the 3rd block, the plastic on the face of the head had worn through, and the iron dust and shot started leaking out. The plastic isn't durable enough for banging on concrete block.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nack

customer_reviews.title: Non marring hammer is light enough for constant use and is easy to hold and control.
customer_reviews.text: I use mine to help split kindling. Wood work on a variety of jobs.
customer_reviews.author: More sense than money

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: Plastic piece of crap. Broke on initial use within 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not made to use on knock rails on hopper trailer
customer_reviews.text: Would probably be ok for someone that wasn’t going to use it everyday but I broke it in 9 days on the job I do don’t purchase to use to unload ddgs from semi hopper trailers will not last long
customer_reviews.author: David Daum

customer_reviews.title: Small dead blow hammer
customer_reviews.text: It looks like what i wanted,but i havent used it yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak Coating
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what this hammer is coated in, but it is not very durable. I do not recommend this hammer for automotive use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice 4 LB. For the price.
customer_reviews.text: I used it to knock in a differential gear on my truck. A Dana 60 differential.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using this for months and not failing once! Buy this and you won't regret!
customer_reviews.author: Yonghoon Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hammer is a bit heavier then described
customer_reviews.text: The extra weight is not a big issue for me, I needed it for the size. But it could be an issue for people who plan on using the hammer for more delicate work then what I use mine for.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Hammer Weighs Two Pounds
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use the hammer, because it weighed two pounds instead of the one pound listed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bang Bang goes the hammer
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this D.B. hamer in my leather work. The no-mark sounds great to me and look forward in setting my #24 snaps. WJ
customer_reviews.author: Buzzsaw

customer_reviews.title: ABN Dead Blow Hammer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Use it to “set” stone and brick in conjunction with scrap wood.
customer_reviews.author: magicant

customer_reviews.title: Beat em up (gently)!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks good,made good,it will be there when I need it. I highly recommend this product for anyone that needs to beat on something without denting it all up.
customer_reviews.author: rutna61

customer_reviews.title: Onetime, as described
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. No issues with delivery or product. Would buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: R. Welke

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Mallet for camping! We wanted to stay away from the wooden ones with a rubber head because they always fall apart. This one is exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Non-slip handle surface. Used for splitting aluminum casings on motorcycle and ATV engines.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Crow

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!! Didn't appreciate how ABN takes pride in their business being in the United States, but FAILS to mention how they distribute made in China tools through out the Midwest. The hammers are junk, as anything made in China is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Used to install seals in transfer cases. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just as a dead blow should. No frills, who cares... Hammer all the live long day. Yippee.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher h41p1N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and works just fine for what I use a dead blow hammer for.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lazy

customer_reviews.title: Great Dead Blow Hammer
customer_reviews.text: I have needed one of these for years and this one is a good one for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roy S

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The end of the hammer has already busted and we use them to wind electric motors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised...great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the hammer to put down small yard fencing. It worked great for that as well as other small tasks. It works as advertised...hits well with no marks. Great purchase especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easy
customer_reviews.text: Literally didn’t last 20 minutes and the head busted open. Wasn’t hitting anything sharp or hard. I understand it’s a cheap tool but it could’ve at least lasted a week or so. Won’t be buying another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin hammer surface
customer_reviews.text: Decent hammer however I was using it to tap out an engine bearing and the rubber surface broke through spilling the red sand, might just be a defect but you should be aware of the possibility
customer_reviews.author: Cody Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT HAMMER SET AND I WOULD PURCHASE AGAIN IF NEEDED .
customer_reviews.author: LARRY

customer_reviews.title: Best hammer out there.
customer_reviews.text: This dead blow hammer is perfect for being able to deliver a substantial blow without leaving a mark.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: Good hammer!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it too much yet, but I like the feel of this hammer! I'll report back after I've had a chance to use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Jim N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly and easy to find whenever I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Hammer does the job designed for.
customer_reviews.text: It's a dead blow hammer. Felt good in the hand. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Great deadblow
customer_reviews.text: Union Glazier for over 15 year, this deadblow mallet is a must. Great mallet, only down fall is you will never need another deadblow mallet again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: holding up so far and im in the tool and die trade
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item is exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Hammer is exactly was I was looking for. I would definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Pretzel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what I was looking for im in highrise construction
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: the hammer was perfect for what i wanted to use it for (pounding stakes into the ground).
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed a mallet that would not mushroom the head of my real estate sign post and this one worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Robby T

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Good price, seemingly good quality. Any problems and I'll update the review, but so far I'm ecstatic with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Bertles

customer_reviews.title: Not great but good enough for rhe price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price iv just used it rp sound trees and pound in wedges
customer_reviews.author: crashnburn38

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one masonry job, common with all hammers like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the hammer, definitely well made. No doubt the tool will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A cool tool
customer_reviews.text: The 3 lb dead blow hammer is the perfect took for removing my spinner-mounted wheels. And it's easy to find in my dingy garage, because the orange color practically glows in the dark! A nice tool for my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Milling with the deadblow
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for milling and it made a great difference in tightening the vise
customer_reviews.author: Joey Ponder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tool!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool to remove a stubborn rim.....great price with Prime!!
customer_reviews.author: big willie

customer_reviews.title: Here is Another satisfied customer for youre company , judging by the service i recieved !!
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery !! So far a quality product !! Satisfied Customer! ! Very Pleased
customer_reviews.author: michael roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid hammer set. Good value, all things considered. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JoeT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and is a very good product that I use on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: David Fechter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was as expected shipped quickly great quality.. exactly what we needed ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good hammer
customer_reviews.text: They don’t fall apart like your typical cheap hammers they hold up really well especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like this because its strong and will not damage the brake rotor and by putting back the axle.
customer_reviews.author: Erwin Kaw

customer_reviews.title: Good tool that doesn’t smell like chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Are use this primarily from my leather working. It’s nothing fancy but I really like is that it doesn’t stink. I bought dead blow hammer’s at Harbor freight in the past and they stink of that plastic kind of formaldehyde smell. This one smelled neutral
customer_reviews.author: Yitzhak HaLevy

customer_reviews.title: Great orange color and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: So far hammer works great and love the way it looks
customer_reviews.author: G. C.

product_meta.title: ABN Dead Blow Hammer, 4 lb Pound – Unicast Mallet with Non-Marring Rubber Coating
feature_bullets: [Deadblow Mallet]: No longer will you need to worry about damaging wood, metal, or other surfaces when using the ABN Dead Blow Hammer Set Deadblow Hammer 1pc
[Built to Last]: Dead hammer blow orange mallet constructed of durable rubber to withstand extended, repeated use; Orange rubber hammer will not crack or break under the pressure

[Soft Mallet]: Dead blow rubber hammer designed to prevent marring of surfaces; Dead mallet includes soft rubber head that will not spark or break through delicate surfaces; Mallet weighs 4 pounds (1.8kg)
[Comfort Grip]: Orange dead blow hammer includes rubber coated serrated 11-inch (27.9cm) gripping handle for comfortable grip while in use
[Versatility in Use]: Bright orange unicast design minimizes damage and deadens noise on any surface; Use dead blow mallet on anything from automobiles to sheet metal

specifications.Warranty Description: This product has a manufacturer warranty against defects in materials and workmanship for a period of ONE
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars291 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
